24 #ifndef _BGPSTREAM_READER_H

27 #include <pthread.h>

30 #include "bgpstream_constants.h"
31 #include "bgpstream_record.h"

35 #include <bgpdump_lib.h>

38 typedef enum {
39  BGPSTREAM_READER_STATUS_VALID_ENTRY,
40  BGPSTREAM_READER_STATUS_FILTERED_DUMP,
41  BGPSTREAM_READER_STATUS_EMPTY_DUMP,
42  BGPSTREAM_READER_STATUS_CANT_OPEN_DUMP,
43  BGPSTREAM_READER_STATUS_CORRUPTED_DUMP,
44  BGPSTREAM_READER_STATUS_END_OF_DUMP
45 } bgpstream_reader_status_t;
46 
47 typedef struct struct_bgpstream_reader_t bgpstream_reader_t;
48 
49 typedef enum {
50  BGPSTREAM_READER_MGR_STATUS_EMPTY_READER_MGR,
51  BGPSTREAM_READER_MGR_STATUS_NON_EMPTY_READER_MGR
52 } bgpstream_reader_mgr_status_t;
53 
54 typedef struct struct_bgpstream_reader_mgr_t {
55  bgpstream_reader_t *reader_queue;
56  const bgpstream_filter_mgr_t *filter_mgr;
57  bgpstream_reader_mgr_status_t status;
58 } bgpstream_reader_mgr_t;
59 
60 
61 
62 /* create a new reader mgr */
63 bgpstream_reader_mgr_t * bgpstream_reader_mgr_create(const bgpstream_filter_mgr_t * const filter_mgr);
64 /* check if the readers' queue is empty */
65 bool bgpstream_reader_mgr_is_empty(const bgpstream_reader_mgr_t * const bs_reader_mgr);
66 
67 /* use a list of inputs to populate the readers' queue */
68 void bgpstream_reader_mgr_add(bgpstream_reader_mgr_t * const bs_reader_mgr,
69  const bgpstream_input_t * const toprocess_queue,
70  const bgpstream_filter_mgr_t * const filter_mgr);
71 
72 /* get the next available record (and update the reader mgr status) */
73 int bgpstream_reader_mgr_get_next_record(bgpstream_reader_mgr_t * const bs_reader_mgr,
74  bgpstream_record_t *const bs_record,
75  const bgpstream_filter_mgr_t * const filter_mgr);
76 
77 /* destroy the reader manager */
78 void bgpstream_reader_mgr_destroy(bgpstream_reader_mgr_t * const bs_reader_mgr);
79 
80 #endif /* _BGPSTREAM_READER_H */
